00064 struct block_header
00065 {
00066     typedef detail::atomic_count count_type;
00067 
00068 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00069         static mutex mutex_;
00070 #endif
00071 
00072     count_type count_;                                                          
00073     block_header * redir_;                                                      
00075         bool destroy_;                                                                  
00076     intrusive_list::node tag_;                                          
00078     intrusive_list includes_;                                           
00079     intrusive_list elements_;                                           
00081 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00082         static mutex pool_mutex_;
00083 #endif
00084 
00085     static fast_pool_allocator<block_header> pool_;
00091     block_header() : count_(1), redir_(this), destroy_(false)
00092     {
00093         includes_.push_back(& tag_);
00094     }
00095 
00096         
00103     bool release()
00104     {
00105         if (-- count_ == 0)
00106         {
00107                         destroy_ = true;
00108                         
00109             for (intrusive_list::iterator<block_base, & block_base::block_tag_> i; i = elements_.begin(), i != elements_.end(); )
00110                 delete &* i;
00111                 
00112                         destroy_ = false;
00113             
00114             for (intrusive_list::iterator<block_header, & block_header::tag_> i = includes_.begin(), j; j = i, i != includes_.end(); i = j)
00115                         { 
00116                                 ++ j;
00117                                 
00118                 if (&* i != this)
00119                     delete &* i;
00120                         }
00121 
00122             return true;
00123         }
00124 
00125         return false;
00126     }
00127 
00128         
00135     block_header * redir() const
00136     {
00137         block_header * p = redir_;
00138         
00139         while (p != p->redir_)
00140                 p = p->redir_;
00141         
00142         return p;
00143     }
00144         
00145         
00152     void redir(block_header * p)
00153     {
00154         block_header * q = p->redir();
00155         
00156         if (redir_ != q)
00157         {
00158             redir_ = q;
00159             redir_->includes_.merge(includes_);
00160             redir_->elements_.merge(elements_);
00161             new (& redir_->count_) count_type(redir_->count_ + count_); 
00162         }
00163     }
00164 
00165         
00173     void * operator new (size_t s)
00174     {
00175 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00176         mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(pool_mutex_);
00177 #endif
00178         return pool_.allocate(s);
00179     }
00180     
00181         
00190     void * operator new (size_t s, block_header * p)
00191     {
00192         return p;
00193     }
00194 
00195         
00202     void operator delete (void * p)
00203     {
00204 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00205         mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(pool_mutex_);
00206 #endif
00207         pool_.deallocate(static_cast<block_header *>(p), sizeof(block_header));
00208     }

00218 #define TEMPLATE_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) typename T ## n
00219 #define ARGUMENT_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) T ## n const & t ## n
00220 #define PARAMETER_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) t ## n
00221 
00222 #define BEFRIEND_MAKE_BLOCK(z, n, text)                                                                                                                                                         \
00223         template <typename V, BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, TEMPLATE_DECL, 0)>                                                                                                 \
00224                 friend block_ptr<V> text(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, ARGUMENT_DECL, 0));
00225 
00226 #define CONSTRUCT_MAKE_BLOCK(z, n, text)                                                                                                                                                            \
00227         template <typename V, BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, TEMPLATE_DECL, 0)>                                                                                                 \
00228                 block_ptr<V> text(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, ARGUMENT_DECL, 0))                                                                                                                 \
00229                 {                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00230                         return block_ptr<V>(new block<V>(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, PARAMETER_DECL, 0)));                                                                       \
00231                 }

00240 template <typename T>
00241     class block_ptr : public block_ptr_base<T>
00242     {
00243         template <typename> friend class block_ptr;
00244 
00245         typedef block_ptr_base<T> base;
00246         
00247         using base::share;
00248                 using base::po_;
00249 
00250         union
00251         {
00252             block_header * ps_;                                         
00253             intrusive_stack::node pn_;                          
00254         };
00255 
00256 #ifdef BOOST_BP_RAW_POINTER
00257         public:
00258 #endif
00259 
00265         template <typename V>
00266             block_ptr(block<V> * p) : base(p)
00267             {
00268                 if (! pool::is_from(this))
00269                 {
00270                     ps_ = new block_header();
00271 
00272                     init(p);
00273                 }
00274                 else
00275                 {
00276                     pool::top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00277                     pool::top(this)->inits_.merge(p->inits_);
00278                 }
00279             }
00280 
00281                 
00288         template <typename V>
00289             block_ptr & operator = (block<V> * p)
00290             {
00291                 release(false);
00292 
00293                 init(p);
00294 
00295                 base::operator = (p);
00296 
00297                 return * this;
00298             }
00299             
00300                 template <typename V>
00301                         friend block_ptr<V> make_block();
00302 
00303                 BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO(1, 10, BEFRIEND_MAKE_BLOCK, make_block)
00304 
00305     public:
00306         typedef T                       value_type;
00307         typedef block<value_type>     element_type;
00308 
00309 
00314         block_ptr() : ps_(0)
00315         {
00316             if (! pool::is_from(this))
00317                 ps_ = new block_header();
00318             else
00319                 pool::top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00320         }

00334                 else
00335                     pool::top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);

00364         template <typename V>
00365             block_ptr & operator = (block_ptr<V> const & p)
00366             {
00367 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00368                         mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(block_header::mutex_);
00369 #endif
00370 
00371                 if (ps_->redir() != p.ps_->redir())
00372                 {
00373                     release(false);
00374                                         
00375                     ps_->redir(p.ps_);
00376                 }
00377                 base::operator = (p);
00378 
00379                 return * this;
00380             }
00381

00391                 return operator = <T>(p);
00392             }

00394         void reset()
00395         {
00396 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00397                 mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(block_header::mutex_);
00398 #endif
00399 
00400             release(false);
00401         }
00402         
00403         bool cyclic() const
00404         {
00405                 return ps_->redir()->destroy_;
00406         }
00407 
00408         ~block_ptr()
00409         {
00410 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00411                 mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(block_header::mutex_);
00412 #endif
00413 
00414                         if (cyclic())
00415                                 base::po_ = 0;
00416                         else
00417                                 release(true);
00418         }
00419 
00420     private:
00427         void release(bool d)
00428         {
00429             base::reset();
00430             
00431             if (! pool::is_from(this))
00432             {
00433                         block_header * p = ps_->redir();
00434         
00435                 if (p->release())
00436                     if (! d)
00437                     {
00438                         p->~block_header();
00439                         ps_ = new (p) block_header();
00440                     }
00441                     else
00442                         delete p;
00443                 else 
00444                                         if (! d)
00445                         ps_ = new block_header();
00446             }
00447         }
00448 
00449                 
00456         void init(block_base * p)
00457         {
00458             if (p->init_)
00459                 return;
00460 
00461                 block_header * q = ps_->redir();
00462         
00463                         // iterate memory blocks
00464             for (intrusive_list::iterator<block_base, & block_base::init_tag_> i = p->inits_.begin(); i != p->inits_.end(); ++ i)
00465             {
00466                 i->init_ = true;
00467                 q->elements_.push_back(& i->block_tag_);
00468 
00469                                 // iterate block_ptr elements
00470                 for (intrusive_stack::iterator<block_ptr, & block_ptr::pn_> j = i->ptrs_.begin(), k; k = j, j != i->ptrs_.end(); j = k)
00471                                 {
00472                                         ++ k;
00473                     j->ps_ = ps_;
00474                                 }
00475             }
00476         }
00477 
00478         public:
00479 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_RVALUE_REFS)
00480         block_ptr(block_ptr<T> && p): base(std::move(p.po_)), ps_(std::move(p.ps_))
00481         {
00482         }
00483 
00484         template<class Y>
00485                 block_ptr(block_ptr<Y> && p): base(std::move(p.po_)), ps_(std::move(p.ps_))
00486                 {
00487                 }
00488

00490         {
00491                 po_ = std::move(p.po_);
00492                 ps_ = std::move(p.ps_);
00493                 
00494                 return *this;

00509         block_ptr<V> make_block()
